response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in its utility to you. Given its importance to both of us, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. I believe this offers a fair compromise between its value to you and my valuation, ensuring we both benefit from this transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
